sentences: In the morning contact group, chaired by Leon Charles (Grenada), SAUDI ARABIA, opposed by Switzerland, for the EIG, preferred removing reference to the ADP using the information from the 2013-2015 Review.
The US, supported by BRAZIL, CANADA and JAPAN, proposed compromise text replacing 'the ADP' with 'the broader UNFCCC'.
The EU, supported by NORWAY, TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO, and ANTINGUA AND BARBUDA, and opposed by SAUDI ARABIA, suggested adding to the US proposal 'including in the ADP'.
CHINA and SAUDI ARABIA preferred to 'take note of' rather than 'use' information.
